ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] freeeqguides
ygData.msgSnippet: Steven Hulse wrote: Hmm, not sure why my messages aren t showing up for some but I do apologize. It s something funky with my mail I guess. aw, mail s
ygData.messageBody:
Steven Hulse wrote:

'Hmm, not sure why my messages aren't showing up for some but I do apologize. It's something funky with my mail I guess."

aw, mail's messing up for me too.

"Anyway to answer your email David, I do understand where your coming from but for me that's the whole point. last night is a good example, I got over to Dagnor's and unfortunately went the wrong way and got killed, (several times), while trying to recover my body. I also was bound over in WF so that made the trip even more fun! One of my guildmates and a necro from another guild came to my aid but before this happened we spent the majority of the evening trying to get my corpse."

:( Why did it take you so long to get your corpse?

"To answer the issue of getting invites, well I really don't have that much of a problem getting them. My Ranger is invited because of her skills in track and sence heading more than for her "gear"."

:) you're lucky. I always hear that them and halflings are the butt of all jokes. and btw, how do you show them that you have high track and sense heading?

"My Gnome Warrior is invited alot by lower to mid level classes to help them with exp and funds. Mostly because I enjoy it and don't really care about my own personal gains."

Gnome warrior? That must make some good roleplaying.

"My Mage is just coming up but he gets invited alot too mostly becuase he can take care of his own pretty well without his magic."

ok, um, how's that possible?

and gtg, i will finish this later.
